name: 𝐉𝐀𝐍𝐊𝐄𝐄𝐒 𝐌𝐔𝐒𝐈𝐂
description: Telegram bot for Streaming Video & Music trought the Telegram Group Video Chat, powered by PyTgCalls and Pyrogram

يوزر البوت.description: fill with your bot username from @BotFather but without using '@' symbol

اسم البوت.description: fill with your bot name from @BotFather

يوزر المساعد.description: fill with the assistant username account without @

كود الجلسه.description: fill with the pyrogram String Session

منوجو.description: fill with the mongodb url you created from cloud.mongodb.com (tutorial about how to make it, find it on @VeezSupportGroup)

ايدي المطور.description: list of user id to be added to sudo member list, or just fill with your id

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: This is needed for update feature, if you deployed forked repo put your forked repo link here, if not just leave it as it

يوزر البار.description: if you have group, then fill the group username here without @

يوزر القناه.description: if you have channel, then fill the channel username here without @

يوزر المطور.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

ALIVE_NAME.description: fill with your telegram account nickname/name
